column4: after running aptitude build-dep i'm seeing a bunch of packages with {a} next to their names. what does that mean?
well I am going to assume...since I never run aptitude, that those are the dependecies you asked for
right but some packages do not have {a} next to their names
mm  then I am not sure   I generally just do  sudo apt-get build-dep  nameofpacakge
